name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Solutions Engineer with over 10 years of expertise in Sales Engineering and SaaS solutions. Passionate about continuous learning and contributing to high-impact projects, including tenure at top organizations like VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.
